entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Earlton

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon.
